meanings.definition: A monetary unit of Turkey, equal to 1/100 of a lira.
meanings.sent1: In Turkey, you can buy a lot of candies with just one kopek.
meanings.sent2: I found a kopek on the street while walking to the market.
meanings.sent3: The kopek rolled away, making the children laugh as they chased after it.
meanings.sent4: Her savings were as scarce as a single kopek in a vast desert.
meanings.sent5: The shiny kopek gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A small Russian coin, equal to 1/100 of a ruble.
meanings.sent1: Grandma gave me a kopek to buy a loaf of bread from the bakery.
meanings.sent2: The kopek slipped from my fingers and fell into the fountain.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel buried the shiny kopek in the garden.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were as valuable as a single kopek in a sea of coins.
meanings.sent5: The old man's collection included a rare kopek from the early 1900s.
